description: PWGSC on behalf of DND is issuing this request for standing offers for the acquisition of chartered bus services with driver for 4 regions...detailed in Annex Statement of works.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Invitation to Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is issuing this invitation to tender for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the provision of chartered bus services with driver for several regions in Canada.

### Contract Details

* Tender Closing Date: Wednesday, September 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* Contract Duration: Expected to commence on a date to be determined and to end on July 21, 2025
* Contract Value: To be determined
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR), Quebec (except NCR)

### Tender Information

* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Procurement Category: Services (SRV)

### Contractor Requirements

* Must provide chartered bus services with driver for several regions in Canada
* Must adhere to all applicable laws, regulations, and standards

### Tender Documents

Please note that the tender documents are available on the Ariba discovery portal: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16988553?extsite=MTY5ODg1NTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Contact Information

Please contact Alina Cocieru, Procurement Officer, at [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for any inquiries.

Note: All information is in English and French.

### Annex Statement of Works

Please refer to the Annex Statement of Works for detailed information on the requirements and specifications for the provision of chartered bus services with driver.
